text: The Marrilach River (sometimes called the Daggerchill River) flows from a small lake in the [[Blackcap Mountains]] in [[Breland]], through the town of [[Sumberton]], into [[Silver Lake]]. The Marrilach River Valley is sometimes referred to as the "Valley of Obelisks", referencing the strange crumbling structures that dot the valley.
title: Marrilach River
tooltip: river in Breland in the Blackcaps, forms the Valley of Obelisks
